content: Yes, it's not uncommon for musicians to draw inspiration from each other's works. Many artists have publicly stated their influences and inspirations, and some have even covered songs of their musical heroes. Pink Floyd has influenced many artists in various genres, including Radiohead. Members of Radiohead have cited Pink Floyd as an influence on their music, particularly the album "Dark Side of the Moon." While it's not clear if "Street Spirit" was directly inspired by "Wish You Were Here," the similarities in themes suggest that Radiohead may have drawn inspiration from Pink Floyd's music, among other influences.
